ComicInfo.Summary: A Crypt Called Ithaca [Part 1]: As the Enterprise returns to Earth at the end of it's five year mission, Bright Eyes is accepted as a Starfleet cadet. Spock, Uhura, and Scotty give a debriefing to the Federation, where they are challenged by Administrator Renei. Kirk offers Spock to be the next captain of the Enterprise, but is surprised and hurt when Spock turns him down.
